generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and traffic cones, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: The area where pedestrians are standing, bordered by a curb and railing, is clearly a sidewalk.
- building: Several multi-story buildings with windows and architectural details are visible in the background.
- vegetation: Trees and greenery are visible along the sidewalk and in the background.
- terrain: Grass and soil are visible in the median strip and along the sidewalk.
- sky: The sky is visible in the upper part of the image, appearing clear and bright.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible on the sidewalk, including individuals holding bags and wearing hats.
- truck: A large truck with a green tarp covering its cargo is visible in the center of the road.
- bus: A yellow bus is visible on the left side of the road, partially obscured by the truck.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the left side of the image, showing a green light.
- traffic sign: A yellow traffic sign with directional arrows and text is visible on a pole near the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting the traffic light and traffic signs.
- fence: A low fence or barrier is visible along the right side of the road, separating the road from a construction area.
